_id: don't touch this. mongodb uses this as a unique identifier
name_jp: name_en and name_jp are required in code,
name_en: it's used by channels/ endpoint to search by name.
youtube: absolutely required, it's what the api uses to identify channels.
twitter: you can add also extra fields like this, but it will be static and you'll have to
group: manually add it in defaults.channel.projectFields for it to show.
updated_at: this field and all below it cannot be added manually,
from: it's used by the api when crawling channels and will be automatically overwritten by the api
channel: name the files to 'groupname'.json to register it (eg: hololive.json, nijisanji.json).
channel_stats: group names also can't have dots (.) in them. try to avoid adding special characters to files.
description: if you want to use pre-made files, just drag the files from the default folder to here.
thumbnail: the next objects below these would be the actual examples used by the api.
